title: Overview: 2018 Sony 4K Full Array X900F Series - XBR75X900F
description:
In this video we take a closer look at the full array Sony X900F series LED TV.  This 4k set offers a stunning picture and terrific local dimming.  For more details or to place an order please call our experts at 800-860-3736 or click on the links below.
